          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az elektromos áram</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Electric Current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Elektrische Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Courant Électrique</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az elektromos áram és az áramerősség fogalma, az elektomos áram hatásai, az áramkör</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Definition of Electric Current and Electric Strength, the Effects of Electric Currenti, the Circuit</string>
          </description>

            <string language="hu-HU">fizika</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en-US">effects of the electric current</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>

elektrischen Stärke, die Effekte von elektrischem Currenti, der

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La définition de la force actuelle et électrique

          </description>

          </description>

          </description>
